content:
I don't have personal experience, but the lime leaf thai restaurant in basingstoke has a drink menu that includes beer, wine, and various cocktails. here are some drinks that might go well with your dishes:

1. thai iced tea – a sweet, creamy tea made with condensed milk and served over ice.
2. mai tai – a rum-based cocktail with orange curacao, lime juice, and almond syrup.
3. lemongrass martini – a martini made with lemongrass-infused vodka, lime juice, and simple syrup.
4. singha beer – a popular thai lager beer that pairs well with spicy food.
5. coconut water – a refreshing drink that complements spicy and sour flavors.

of course, these are just some suggestions, and you can always ask the staff for their recommendations on what drinks will complement your meal.
